amount.description:
The gift certificate amount.
 The user cannot change the gift certificate amount after the creation of the gift certificate.

balance.description:
The gift certificate balance.
 This is a computed attribute and cannot be modified.

description.description: The description of the gift certificate.

enabled.description: The enabled flag of the gift certificate.

link.description:
The URL to get the gift certificate.
 This is a computed attribute and cannot be modified.

masked_gift_certificate_code.description:
The masked gift certificate code with all but the
 last 4 characters replaced with a '*' character.
 This is a computed attribute and cannot be modified.

merchant_id.description:
The merchant ID of the gift certificate.
 This is a unique attribute.
 This is a computed attribute and cannot be modified.
 This is used to get, update and the delete gift certificates.

message.description: The message to the recipient of the gift certificate.

order_no.description: The order number of the gift certificate.

recipient_email.description: The email address of the recipient of the gift certificate.

recipient_name.description: The recipient of the gift certificate.

sender_name.description: The sender of the gift certificate.

status.description:
The status of the gift certificate.
 While creating a gift certificate, user can set the status
 to either "pending" or "issued" only.

transactions.description: The transactions of the gift certificate

amount.description: The amount of the gift certificate

order_no.description: The order number of the gift certificate

timestamp.description: The timestamp of the transaction of the gift certificate

type_code.description: The type code of the gift certificate
